title: Replace founder Kuldeep photo with uploaded real photo and remove old image

requirements.text: Replace the existing Founder (Kuldeep) photo used on the website with the user-uploaded real photo, and ensure the old Kuldeep photo is no longer used anywhere in the UI. Keep the photo as a static frontend asset and preserve good display quality in the circular avatar on the Home page “Our Team” section.

quotes: ADD THIS REAL PHOTO OF FOUNDER AND REMOVE OLD

acceptanceCriteria: The Founder (Kuldeep) image displayed in the Home page “Our Team”/Founders section is the newly uploaded real photo.
No other part of the site references or displays the previous/old Kuldeep founder image.
The Kuldeep founder image continues to be served as a static asset (not via the backend) and is rendered correctly in the circular avatar (no distortion; centered crop).
The image path used by the app remains valid (e.g., FoundersSection continues to load without broken images).

constraints: Do not route images through the backend; store and serve them as static frontend assets.
Do not change the founders order, names, or roles (Kuldeep; Saloni Singh; Sumit Srivastava) unless explicitly requested.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them only).
nonGoals: Changing the platform logo or other brand imagery beyond the Kuldeep founder photo replacement.
Updating Saloni Singh or Sumit Srivastava photos.
Adding new founders/team members or changing section copy.

edits: Replace the Kuldeep founder portrait with the uploaded real photo (founder-kuldeep.dim_512x512.jpg > founder-kuldeep.dim_512x512.jpg)
